ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Mike [mailto:mikekb@vvm.com] Sent: Sunday, May 02, 1999 8:58 PM To: shadowknight@onelist.com Subject: [shadowknight] Re: FW: [shadowknight] Re:
ygData.messageBody:
...I am a Shadow Knight I dont trust anyone...;)

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike [mailto:mikekb@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 02, 1999 8:58 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Re: FW: [shadowknight] Re: Quiet...


From: "Mike" <mikekb@...>

I noticed this too, but was not sure and asked. I thought perhaps it was
just a coincidence. Why not duel someone you trust and see for yourself?

----- Original Message -----
From: Thom Shartle <darklingsanction@...>
To: ShadowKnight Maillist <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, May 02, 1999 9:05 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] FW: [shadowknight] Re: Quiet...


> From: "Thom Shartle" <darklingsanction@...>
>
> Are you CERTAIn this is true? I have made it a point to Steal Strength
> anytime I am hit for more then 5points. The frequency certainly seems to
> decrease the more times I do it. Has anyone else noticed this/ tried this?
>
> Sthiel
> Cazic Thule
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: ken [mailto:brooksc@...]
> Sent: Sunday, May 02, 1999 6:39 PM
> To: shadowknight@onelist.com
> Subject: [shadowknight] Re: Quiet...
>
>
> From: "ken" <brooksc@...>
>
> Its a one time thing so casting it more than once is just a waste of a
> weapon swing.
>
>
> Trian Soulstealer
> Cazic Thule
>
> >
> >as far as SK's being underpowered....I just hit 9th level and am now
> >starting to cruise. Our spells aren't the best....but they are fun. Not
> >having to run to every critter i want to engage....being able to suck
> >str...and find my body::shuder:: if i die.
> >
> >One question though that has been floating around. A friend of mine
asked
> >if Siphon Strength works multiple times on one critter. I know you only
> >get the initial Str from the target...but if you keep casting does their
> >Str keep going down even if we are not taking it?
> >
> >Korm
> >Cazic Thule
> >
